mapper.insert: insert into tb_stat_weight (weight_seq, user_seq, current_weight, goal_weight, weight_date) values (s_stat_weight_no.nextval, #{userSeq}, #{currentWeight}, #{goalWeight}, #{weightDate})
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from tb_stat_weight where user_seq=#{userSeq} order by weight_date desc ) where rownum < 8
